Name: Sex City
About the game: Sex City is a simulation game whose ultimate goal is to give you pleasure! Choose one of 24 and start undressing her! With the help of a very entertaining puzzle, you will build a city and along the way, earning a population - the girl will undress in front of you. Become the best builder and simultaneously undress the entire female sex of this depraved city! Game Features: * 24 unique girls; * Each girl has her own level of difficulty, depending on the number of clothes on her; * An entertaining and relaxing puzzle; * Gallery, where you can see all previously opened girls; * Naked girls;
